---
title: "MVLS LTS Network Outputs"
subtitle: "Research outputs from our academic network"
last-updated: "Auto-updated weekly"

## Overview

This website provides an automatically updated list of outputs from the College of MVLS Learning Teaching and Scholarship network at the University of Glasgow. Publication data is sourced directly from [ORCID](https://orcid.org) profiles and updated weekly via GitHub Actions.

::: callout-note
## Current Statistics

-   **44** linked authors
-   **194** SoTL/education outputs
-   **Last updated:** 2026-01-30 11:11:43 GMT
:::

## Recent SoTL Publications

Publications are automatically classified based on journal name and keywords to identify those related to the **Scholarship of Teaching and Learning (SoTL)** and those that are likely to be discipline-specific, so errors may occur. 

- Jayne Orr [School of Biodiversity One Health and Veterinary Medicine]. [Clinical‐year veterinary students are most likely to be confident and competent in calving procedures after blending simulator practicals with videos](https://doi.org/10.1002/vetr.5774) (2026). *Veterinary Record*.
- Emily Nordmann [School of Psychology and Neuroscience]. [Lecture capture as Universal Design for Learning: a post-pandemic scoping review](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.cophys.2025.100896) (2026). *Current Opinion in Physiology*.
- Leighann Sherry [School of Infection & Immunity]. [LinkedIn to Get In: embedding learning activities to support student career development through online professional networking](https://doi.org/10.1099/acmi.0.001125.v3) (2026). *Access Microbiology*.
- Lindsey Pope [School of Health and Wellbeing]. [Preparing Students to Care for Socially Excluded Patients: A Qualitative Study of Inclusion Health in Undergraduate Medical Education](https://doi.org/10.1111/tct.70277) (2026). *The Clinical Teacher*.
- Eileen Cowey [School of Medicine Dentistry and Nursing]. [Undergraduate nursing students' competence in evidence-based practice and associated barriers and facilitators in Arab countries: A systematised review](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.nexres.2025.101283) (2026). *Next Research*.
- Lauren Headland [School of Molecular Biosciences]. [A manifesto for plant science education](https://doi.org/10.1002/ppp3.70115) (2025). *PLANTS, PEOPLE, PLANET*.
- Dimitar Karadzhov [School of Health & Wellbeing]. [Advancing Competency Development in Global Mental Health: A Call for Contextualised, Collaborative and Future-Oriented Approaches](https://doi.org/10.64257/vnybxf92) (2025). *Mental Health Open*.
- Shaun Bremner-Hart [School of Molecular Biosciences]. [Assessment of distinct effects of Parinari curatellifolia Planch.ex Benth Ethanolic leaf extract on glucose transport in different cell types](https://doi.org/10.7717/peerj.20269) (2025). *PeerJ*.
- Jayne Orr [School of Biodiversity One Health and Veterinary Medicine]. [Clinical year veterinary students are concerned about calving cows and request more real‐life, practical exposure to enhance their confidence](https://doi.org/10.1002/vetr.4964) (2025). *Veterinary Record*.
- David Grinter [School of Health and Wellbeing]. [Clinician and Client Reports of the Negative Effects of Neuropsychological Assessment for Dementia](https://doi.org/10.1177/08919887251407122) (2025). *Journal of Geriatric Psychiatry and Neurology*.
